column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Take a day (or two) and enjoy many famous originals from artists including Picasso
column7: and Dahli. Many famous original paintings such as "Nighthawks
column9: or The Old Guitarist." The exhibits range from ancient Sculptures and artifacts from Asia
column11: the Americas and Africa to more contemporary architecture and original mock up models from Frank Lloyd Wright
column13: and Pablo Picasso from right here in Chicago.
